document_data.name: Annalee
document_data.mainbody: '''Annalee''' was a young girl that lived in [[Cormyr]] with her father [[Brehnan Mueller|Brehnan]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: She spent some of her time caring for her family's horses.
document_data.Relationships: Annalee's only known family was her father Brehnan; her mother passed away from illness when she was much younger. Their cottage lay some way's west of [[Calantar's Way]].
document_data.History: During the [[Time of Troubles]], in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, Annalee's father found the young [[magic-user]] known as [[Midnight]] in a field near their home during a wild storm. They took care of the young woman for two weeks, before she regained consciousness and hurriedly continued left for the city of [[Arabel]], with no knowledge she held within her the power of the magic-goddess [[Mystra]].
